item.title: Iris Dataset
item.description: Introduction The famous [@fisher:1936] (or [@anderson:1936]) iris data set gives the measurements (in centimeters) of the sepal length and width, and petal length and width for 50 flowers, each from one of three species of iris. The species are I. setosa, I versicolor, and I. virginica. We provide images for each of the three species in Figure . Researchers are interested in whether they can identify the species from the set of the four measurements taken on the plants.
